import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Footer from "../components/footer" import Header from "../components/header" import Hotline from "../components/hotline" import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { getAllPets, getAllPetFoods, getAllProducts, getAllServices } from "../api/productApi" const Discription = ( props ) => { const params = useParams(); const href = props.href // console.log(params.id); // console.log(href) const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { (async () => { const res = href === 'pet'? await getAllPets() : href === 'petFood'? await getAllPetFoods() : href === 'petService'? await getAllServices() : await getAllProducts() setProduct(res.filter((item) => item.id === params.id)[0]) console.log(res.filter((item) => item.id === params.id)[0]) })() }, []) return ( <>
Trang chủ

Sản phẩm

Mua hàng

ID: {product.id}

{product.name}

{product.unitPrice}đ

) } export default Discription
